# Workflow task overview

An overview of the Workflow task.

Workflow tasks are building blocks of workflows. A task receives data from the preceding task, performs actions predefined by the workflow creator, and optionally triggers the following task.

You add a task by click ![Add task icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/a01c8d38-d08d-41b8-86fd-737af8843ee1?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..EdryeavzLfQUtts_5WElNCqKO_aVYA_BVkJEx5X0zQI) on an existing task on the editing page of a workflow. See [Edit a workflow](/zuora-platform/extensibility/workflow/create-and-manage-workflow-definitions/get-started-with-workflow/edit-a-workflow) to learn about how to edit a workflow.
